net.corda.core.contracts

Interface SchedulableState

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ContractState

    public SchedulableState
extends ContractState

    • Constructor Detail

      • SchedulableState

        public SchedulableState()

    • Method Detail

      • nextScheduledActivity

        @Nullable
ScheduledActivity nextScheduledActivity(@NotNull
                                                  StateRef thisStateRef,
                                                  @NotNull
                                                  FlowLogicRefFactory flowLogicRefFactory)

        Indicate whether there is some activity to be performed at some future point in time with respect to this interface ContractState, what that activity is and at what point in time it should be initiated. This can be used to implement deadlines for payment or processing of financial instruments according to a schedule.

        The state has no reference to it's own StateRef, so supply that for use as input to any FlowLogic constructed.

        Returns:
        null if there is no activity to schedule.
        See Also:
        interface ContractState
